thread.section_title: Paramount Hotel Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 5 Night Break
thread.title_full: 5 Night Break - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Philip S
title: 5 Night Break
text: Was a bit put off on arrival due to the dark atmosphere (low lighting) but got used to the atmospher they are generating. Room we booked was a double but found it very small got an upgrade to a king room for an extra $30 per day. Bedding and Towels changed daily. Enjoyed our stay. I think the hotel could be freashed up a bit. Did not use the restaurant to much choice around the city.
